definition: to lean/to slant/oblique/prejudiced/to deviate from average/to stray from the intended line/stubbornly/contrary to expectations

sentences.english: Eccentricity and spiral angle have different effects on pressure.
sentences.chinese: 偏心率和螺旋角对油膜压力有不同程度的影响。

sentences.english: This paper introduces some new developments concerning orbital eccentricity in stratigraphic and paleoclimatic studies.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了偏心率周期在地层和古气候研究方面的新发展。

sentences.english: Through a big eccentricity will result in a long cycle of this star system movement, the cycle is a finite value.
sentences.chinese: 即使绕转偏心率越大，周期越长，也总会有个周期吧。

sentences.english: With eccentricity increasing a single-mode single-polarization fiber is easier to make.
sentences.chinese: 偏心率越大越有利于制造单模单偏光纤。

sentences.english: The influence of ellipticity on relative dynamics characteristic is analyzed.
sentences.chinese: 分析仿真了偏心率对相对动力学特性的影响。

sentences.english: The researchers also looked at orbital eccentricities of actual exoplanets.
sentences.chinese: 研究人员还研究了实际的系外行星的轨道偏心率。

sentences.english: How does this depend on the orbital eccentricity?
sentences.chinese: 这又怎样取决于轨道偏心率？

sentences.english: It was also observed that the load eccentricity ratio has little influence on the strength loss ratio.
sentences.chinese: 荷载偏心率则对火灾后构件承载力的损失率影响不大。

definition: perihelion, the nearest point of a planet in elliptic orbit to the sun/lower apsis
circular orbit (in astronomy and in astronautics)
aphelion, the furthest point of a planet in elliptic orbit to the sun/opposite: perihelion 近日點|近日点[jin4 ri4 dian3]/higher apsis
ecliptic line/intersection of the ecliptic with the moon's orbit plane
